explore the profound value of authenticity in leadership in Liz Kislik's compelling article. Learn how being true to yourself not only benefits your team but also enhances your personal and professional journey. Are you ready to embrace the transformative power of authentic leadership? Read more: https://bit.ly/47djyr3

At Vistage, we believe that the strength of our community lies in its diversity. Our members‚ÄîCEOs, business owners, and key executives‚Äîeach bring a unique perspective to the table. This leads to more creative solutions, better decision-making, and a broader understanding of the challenges and opportunities we face. In a recent conversation, Vistage Chair Shawn Woods asked member Lisa Davidson to share her insights on the diverse perspectives within Vistage groups. Lisa highlighted how the variety of experiences and opinions has been instrumental in her growth as a leader. How has embracing diverse perspectives impacted your leadership journey? Share your experiences in the comments below!

Great Black male senior leaders aren't born, they're made through continuous growth and development. But how do Black men in senior leadership stay ahead of the game? Discover the secret to achieving sustainable growth and development in leadership. #1 Secret ‚ûù They hire an Executive Coach. Executive coaches provide: 1. Personalized guidance and support. 2. Accountability and YES accountability. 3. Strategic perspective and insight. What happens when you keep trying things the same way, expecting new results? Most leaders define that as insanity! Do something different to get your new result(s). P.S. Sign up for your newsletter to get more insights here ‚ûù bit.ly/3uwfAvm

Our Elevate Your Team Leadership experience is designed to help you improve your effectiveness as a leader so that you can inspire your team to be high-performing. If you‚Äôre looking to improve your ability to lead and influence others, this journey is for you! https://bit.ly/3OFL6NO

We all have courage. The question is, are we tapping into it? If you are wondering HOW you can do that, dive into this article where I give you some ideas that have worked well for me and my clients. #courage #leadership #consciousleadership #acornoak #consciousleaders

Group Account Directors, it get's to the point where you start to feel the niggle. The time for change.. and if you're feeling it might be next year, now is the time to start having those conversations.. Reach out for a confidential chat regarding leadership opportunities in the market for 2024. It is looking like a big year of change and shake-up ahead, in a good way! üìß lilian@creativenatives.com.au

Amen on this Jennifer Fillmore I completely agree with you! The visual of leadership being like a guiding light is a beautiful metaphor. When you have a clear vision and offer something attractive, people are naturally drawn to you and feel supported. It's like creating a positive magnetism that inspires and motivates others to join you on your journey. Instead of having to pull people along, they willingly follow because they believe in your leadership and the direction you're heading. This kind of leadership not only fosters a strong sense of unity and collaboration within a team, but it also encourages individuals to tap into their own creativity and potential. It's truly empowering for everyone involved.

When you're on a winning streak, you're climbing higher. üí• Thrilled to announce my participation in a Leadership Conference in Arizona, where I'll have the opportunity to meet and learn from some truly exceptional leaders. üí• And, I recently participated in a leadership event where I ended up winning the prize. See picture below. Excited to read this book when I return from this amazing conference. #leadershipdevelopment, #powerful, Amanda Crocker, Ilana Golan, Natashia Nunez, Gina Martin PCC, CPC, ELI-MP, Su Zangara, PCC, ELI-MP

Imagine a place as a Senior Revenue Leader, where you can find the answers and validate ideas where you're opinion is valued and you feel safe enough to ask open ended questions. Imagine no more, This Is The Place. Don't take my word for it, listen to the members of Europes most senior revenue leadership community.
